Project.name: Hello World Demo for CF
Project.Description: This simple demo illustrates basic use of the PureMVC framework for ColdFusion.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * Simple test of the framework.
Project.Installation: Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a HelloWorld_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\HelloWorld_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
